channel.title: camera on Julio Merino (jmmv.dev)
channel.description: Recent content in camera on Julio Merino (jmmv.dev)

item.title: New camera (and current desktop)
item.description: After some time complaining about the slowness, the size and the non-working zoom of my old camera, a Kodak Easyshare DX4530 that my father gave me when replacing it, I am now a proud owner of a Canon PowerShot A570 IS. This is my first "decent" digital camera, and I'm looking forward to learning the basics of photography with it. This camera is bigger than what I planned — it is not much smaller than the Kodak —, but, on the other hand, it offers lots of features worth having.
